meanings.sent1: The unliked movie received bad reviews from everyone.
meanings.sent2: The new student felt unliked by their classmates.
meanings.sent3: The unliked sandwich was left uneaten in the lunchbox.
meanings.sent4: The unliked idea was quickly dismissed by the team.
meanings.sent5: The unliked painting was hidden away in the attic.

meanings.sent1: She unliked the post on social media after realizing her mistake.
meanings.sent2: He unliked the song on his playlist because it no longer resonated with him.
meanings.sent3: The cat unliked the new brand of cat food and refused to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The child unliked the toy after playing with it for only a few minutes.
meanings.sent5: The customer unliked the product and returned it to the store.

meanings.definition: Not having received approval or support.
meanings.sent1: The unliked proposal was met with silence in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She felt unliked by her colleagues after her idea was ignored.
meanings.sent3: The unliked candidate struggled to gain votes in the election.
meanings.sent4: The unliked project was left unfinished due to lack of interest.
meanings.sent5: The unliked decision caused tension among the team members.
